To start auto scrolling

Press the icon located on the toolbar to start scrolling.

You can also press Spacebar to start scrolling.

Scrolling speed

The value is scrolling speed. Max is 99, and min is 1.

You can also adjust it using the keyboard shortcut Shift + Arrow Up key to increase the value and Shift + Arrow Down key to decrease the value.

To stop scrolling

The value decides the weather stoppling the scrolling when you click the scrolling window.

You can also press Spacebar to stop scrolling.
